summary: Just used nomo89\'s awesome \"Heartstone\" mod and made a version for beastraces.
descriptionHtml:
This is just a beast races version of nomo89\'s awesome \"Heartstone\" mod - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32307
Should be compatible for Argonians and Khajiit, both male and female. I didn\'t change anything else - it must be craftable like nomo89\'s original version. Uses nomo89\'s meshes but does not require his original non-beast mod.
Requires Dragonborn DLC!

All credit goes to nomo89 - for his great mod and a permission for making beast races version.

Have fun!
author: AncientNightblade
